async fn cat(files : ArrayView[String]) -> Unit raise {
  if files is [] {
    @async.stdin.read_streaming() // read from stdin only once
  } else {
    for file in files {
      if file is "-" {
        @async.stdin.read_streaming() // read from stdin
        continue
      } else {
        @async.path(file).read_all()
      }
    }
  }
}
